rooms.description: Contemporary open-plan living and kitchen space featuring high ceilings, large windows for natural light and Vastu compliant north-eastern orientation. Includes modern fixtures and integrated storage.
Master bedroom with ensuite bathroom and closet; designed for privacy and comfort, located in the south-western part of the apartment to ensure positive energy flow.
Guest bedroom with sufficient space and storage; positioned adjacent to living area for easy access. Vastu guidelines considered in placement.
Third bedroom designed for children or additional guests; compact yet functional layout aligning with modern aesthetics.
Fourth bedroom offering a versatile space that can serve as a home office or guest room, ensuring balanced energy flow and accessibility.
Private bathroom attached to master bedroom with modern fixtures and privacy features in accordance with building norms.

openings.description: Large window for natural light and ventilation placed according to Vastu guidelines.
Main entrance door aligned with local building norms ensuring secure and aesthetic access.
